channel.title: Join Renown Scape! 3 spots open! [317]
channel.description:
[SIZE=5][B]Hello, I'm currently looking for 3 helpers! Talk to me in game (durky) [url=http://www.renown-rsps.com]Renown rsps[/url] or on skype (jdurky)[/B][/SIZE]
Need Advertiser - takes care of all advertising, Banner modifying, voting sites, etc.
Second developer - Lots of things need added need help doing so, Preferably you know a decent amount about clients. but if you don't its okay because I need lots of things in game added / fixed. Client Developer - If second developer doesn't know clients, then this person will be found.
Website developer / maintainer - everything to do with website is controlled by this person. Layout, Forums, auto vote, auto donate(in future), highscores. Everything. I have added all the basics, I need someone to take it all to the next level.
Currently we have Head Developer / Owner - Durky Second Developer / Co-owner - Open Client Developer - Open Website Developer - Open Advertiser - Open

item.title: Join Renown Scape! 3 spots open! [317]

@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[SIZE=5][B]Hello, I’m currently looking for 3 helpers! Talk to me in game (durky) Renown rsps or on skype (jdurky)[/B][/SIZE]

Need
Advertiser - takes care of all advertising, Banner modifying, voting sites, etc.

Second developer - Lots of things need added need help doing so, Preferably you know a decent amount about clients. but if you don’t its okay because I need lots of things in game added / fixed.
Client Developer - If second developer doesn’t know clients, then this person will be found.

Website developer / maintainer - everything to do with website is controlled by this person. Layout, Forums, auto vote, auto donate(in future), highscores. Everything. I have added all the basics, I need someone to take it all to the next level.
